quotes.text: Do not dwell in the past,do not dream of the future,concentrate on the present moment.
quotes.author: Orlando Bloom

quotes.text: It's a good thing to be strange, normalness leads to sadness.
quotes.author: Phil Lester

days.name: Monday 22 August
days.info: School Holiday/New Students Orientation Morning/Grade 6 Transition

quotes.text: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud
quotes.author: Didou Maksimovic

quotes.text: These are attractive forces, well I quite like them
quotes.author: Mr. Harker

quotes.text: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: Nothing will work unless you do.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Integrity is doing the right thing, even when no one is watching.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.text: The more you search for perfection, the further away it becomes.
quotes.author: Hairdas Chadhuri

quotes.text: They dont want you to win. So what to we do? WIN WIN WIN no matter WHAT
quotes.author: Dj Khaled

quotes.text: I am always late on principle, my principle being that punctuality is the thief of time.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Just do it
quotes.author: Shia Labeouf

quotes.text: There are no mistakes, only happy accidents.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: Start by doing what's necessary; then do what's possible and suddenly you are doing the impossible
quotes.author: Fancis of Assisi

quotes.text: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Wanting to be someone else is a waste of who you are.
quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

quotes.text: To do good, you actually have to do something.
quotes.author: Yvon Chouinard

quotes.text: Everybody is a genius.  But if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will live its whole life believing it is stupid.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Why worry?  If you've done the best you can, worrying won't make it any better.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: A line is a dot that went for a walk.
quotes.author: Paul Klee

quotes.text: Put that cookie down, NOW!!!
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: Anxiety is the dizziness of freedom.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.text: Treat others as you would like to be treated
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
quotes.author: Hellen Keller

quotes.text: Life is what happens while you're busy making other plans
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: I don’t think we can solve the outside problems until we solve the ones within.
quotes.author: Jon Foreman

quotes.text: Education is what remains after one has forgotten what one has learned in school.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Let us remember: one book, one pen, one child, and one teacher can change the world.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.text: Fear is the path to the dark side…fear leads to anger…anger leads to hate…hate leads to suffering.
quotes.author: Yoda

quotes.text: Always look on the bright side of life
quotes.author: Monty Python

quotes.text: In film, we sculpt time, we sculpt behaviour and we sculpt light.
quotes.author: David Fincher

quotes.text: If you only read the books that everyone else is reading, you can only think what everyone else is thinking.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.text: What if I fall? Oh, Darling, what if you fly?
quotes.author: Erin Hanson

quotes.text: It is going to be legend ... wait for it ... Dary
quotes.author: Barney Stinson

quotes.text: Sometimes the thing holding you back is all in your head
quotes.author: Symeon Berlizov

quotes.text: Be who you are and say what you feel because those who mind don't matter and those who matter don't mind
quotes.author: Dr.Seuss

quotes.text: Do not judge me by my successes, judge me by how many times I fell down and got back up again.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.text: If you can't fly, then run, if you can't run, then walk, if you can't walk, then crawl, but whatever you do, you have to keep moving forward.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: you are a human with one life and it's up to you to make it the best life you can
quotes.author: Dan Howell

quotes.text: I find your lack of faith... Disturbing...
quotes.author: Darth Vader

quotes.text: Stay focused, overcome it! That's how the great ones do!
quotes.author: DJ Khaled

quotes.text: HIGH school doesn't always mean HIGH grades
quotes.author: Sandreezy

quotes.text: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: We do not give a man a fish, we teach him how to fish.
quotes.author: Mr.Harcet

quotes.text: Are you a doctor?
quotes.author: Mr Strange.

quotes.text: Life goes on. if you're going through something, its not the end of the world, even if it feels like it.
quotes.author: May Fares

quotes.text: If you can do what you do best and be happy, you're further along in life than most people.
quotes.author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quotes.text: When life gives you lemons, make grape juice sit back relax and watch the world wonder how you did that.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Is your pen running out? Well you better run after it
quotes.author: Mr. Harker

quotes.text: I can. I will. End of story.
quotes.author: Max Kaiser

quotes.text: Without school you won't know what day it is
quotes.author: Fahad Al Mansouri

quotes.text: Success is a beast. And it actually puts the emphasis on the wrong thing. You get away with more instead of looking within.
quotes.author: Brad Pitt

quotes.text: If you wait until the right time to have a child you'll die childless, and I think film making is very much the same thing. You just have to take the plunge and just start shooting something even if it's bad.
quotes.author: James Cameron

quotes.text: Comparison is the thief of joy.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Politicians need a film appreciation course.
quotes.author: Anurag Kashyap

quotes.text: I am Mr.Wolf. I solve problems.
quotes.author: Pulp Fiction

quotes.text: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Treat others as you would like to be treated
quotes.author: Ancient proverb

quotes.text: Things needn't be black or whilte
quotes.author: Louise Bourgeois

quotes.text: Whoever controls the media, the images, controls the culture.
quotes.author: Allen Ginsberg

quotes.text: Mistakes make us grow
quotes.author: Ms. Pagura

quotes.text: If you want it, work for it. It's that simple.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Only when the last tree has died and the last river been poisoned and the last fish been caught will we realise that we cannot eat money
quotes.author: Cree First Nations

quotes.text: A lie can travel halfway around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: What you read when you don't have to determines what you will be when you can't help it.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: I never look back, darling!  It distracts from the now.
quotes.author: Edna Mode

quotes.text: It ain't what you don't know that gets you into trouble. It's what you know for sure that just ain't so.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Advantage through planning
quotes.author: Mr. Handcock

quotes.text: Time flies like the wind. Fruit flies like bananas.
quotes.author: anon

quotes.text: Another one.
quotes.author: DJ Khaled

quotes.text: Before you know it it's 3AM and you're 80 years old and you can't remember what it was like to have 20 year old thoughts or a 10 year old heart.
quotes.author: Anita Pallenberg

quotes.text: Rise and Rise again, until the Lambs are Lions !
quotes.author: Robin-Hood

quotes.text: The future depends on what we do in the present.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: And those who were seen dancing were thought to be insane by those who could not hear the music
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: I would rather fail at something I love, than succeed at something I hate.
quotes.author: Symeon Berlizov

quotes.text: Don't drink and drive; Don't think, derive
quotes.author: Mr. Harcet

quotes.text: Dreams is not what you see in the sleep. Dreams is the thing which doesn't let you sleep.
quotes.author: A.P.J Abdul Kalam

quotes.text: I'm always amazed that people take what I say seriously. I don't even take what I am seriously.
quotes.author: David Bowie
